subsection.name: Submit (POST)
subsection.p: The 'submit' service accepts a JSON string containing the following keys:
The response will include the binning job identifier as a long.

subsection.name: Lookup Status (GET)
subsection.p: The response will be a deserialization of a DiagnosticStatusType object. The reponse format can be rendered as xml or json (defaults to xml). For example:
